headline: J.M. Smucker: A Stable Business That Deserves Attention, Hold For Now
summary: J.M. Smucker is a stable, low-growth business with a high dividend yield, but watch out for its high debt load before considering an investment. See more on SJM here.

raw.headline: J.M. Smucker: A Stable Business That Deserves Attention, Hold For Now

headline: Three Reasons Why SJM is Risky and One Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Over the past six months, J. M. Smucker’s stock price has fallen to $107.20. Shareholders have lost 6.2% of their capital, highly disappointing when considering the S&P 500 has climbed 10.7%. This may have investors wondering how to approach the situation.

headline: JM Smucker opens Uncrustables facility in Alabama
summary: The food giant's $1.1 billion investment marks the third manufacturing location dedicated to the brand.
